      • ValidateInt

        public static int ValidateInt​(java.lang.String value,
                              java.lang.String errorText,
                              int minRange,
                              int maxRange)
        method that validates if user's input is of an int type and if it's in valid range
        Parameters:
        value - (String) user input that will be evaluated
        errorText - (String) text to display if evaluation fails
        minRange - minimum range for the input
        maxRange - maximum range for the input
        Returns:
        returns an integer

        method that checks whether climber have any mountains recorded

        Returns:
